To be posted (once I scan them in about a week):

1. My rendition of the Nakajima Nobori painting of Saitou.
2. My rendition of the Nakajima Nobori painting of Hara Gorou's 
sister (the "mystery woman").
3. A drawing of Kawai Tsuginosuke (chief councilor of the Nagaoka 
domain).
4. Some other (coming soon) Bakumatsu drawings.

Just thought I'd let you all know.

--M.
